    • Uses of EEvent in dillon.gameAPI.event

      Classes in dillon.gameAPI.event with type parameters of type EEvent 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  EEHandler<T extends EEvent>
      This is a handler for any engine event that comes by.
      Subclasses of EEvent in dillon.gameAPI.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  KeyEngineEvent
      Event for when a key is pressed.
      class  MouseEngineEvent
      Fires when a mouse event occurs.
      class  NetworkEvent
      Fires when a network-related event occurs.
      class  PromptEvent
      Fires when a prompt is answered.
      class  RenderEvent
      Fires to indicate that a rendering event should take place.
      class  ShutdownEvent
      Indicates a shutdown of the engine.
      class  TickEvent
      Indicates when everything should tick.
